member.name: T:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.Nexmo_SenderId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to LetsShare.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_AccountNotEnabledForREST
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Account not enabled for REST.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_AccountNotEnabledForREST_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This account is not provisioned for REST submission, you should use SMPP instead.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_CommunicationFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Communication Failed.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_CommunicationFailed_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message was not submitted because there was a communication failure.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_FacilityNotAllowed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Facility not allowed.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_FacilityNotAllowed_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Your request makes use of a facility that is not enabled on your account.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InternalError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Internal error.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InternalError_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An error has occurred in the Nexmo platform whilst processing this message.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidCredentials
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid credentials.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidCredentials_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The api_key / api_secret you supplied is either invalid or disabled.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid message.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidMessage_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Nexmo platform was unable to process this message, for example, an un-recognized number prefix or the number is not whitelisted if your account is new.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidMessageClass
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to NexmoResponseCode_InvalidMessageClass.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidMessageClass_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The message class value supplied was out of range (0 - 3).

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidParams
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid params.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidParams_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value of one or more parameters is invalid.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidSenderAddress
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid sender address.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidSenderAddress_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The sender address (from parameter) was not allowed for this message. Restrictions may apply depending on the destination see our FAQs.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidSignature
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid Signature.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidSignature_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message was not submitted due to a verification failure in the submitted signature.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidTTL
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid TTL.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_InvalidTTL_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The ttl parameter values is invalid.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_MessageTooLong
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message too long.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_MessageTooLong_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Applies to Binary submissions, where the length of the UDH and the message body combined exceed 140 octets.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_MissingParams
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Missing params.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_MissingParams_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Your request is incomplete and missing some mandatory parameters.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_NumberBarred
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Number barred.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_NumberBarred_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The number you are trying to submit to is blacklisted and may not receive messages.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_PartnerAccountBarred
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Partner account barred.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_PartnerAccountBarred_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The api_key you supplied is for an account that has been barred from submitting messages.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_PartnerQuotaExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Partner quota exceeded.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_PartnerQuotaExceeded_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Your pre-pay account does not have sufficient credit to process this message.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_Success
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Success.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_Success_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The message was successfully accepted for delivery by Nexmo.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_Throttled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Throttled.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.Resources.NexmoResponseCode_Throttled_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You have exceeded the submission capacity allowed on this account, please back-off and retry.

member.name: T:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters
member.summary: Параметры запроса отправки SMS.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.From
member.summary: Required. Sender address may be alphanumeric (Ex: from=MyCompany20). Restrictions may apply, depending on the destination.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.To
member.summary: Required. Mobile number in international format, and one recipient per request. Ex: to=447525856424 or to=00447525856424 when sending to UK.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.Type
member.summary: Optional. This can be omitted for text (default), but is required when sending a Binary (binary), WAP Push (wappush), Unicode message (unicode), vcal (vcal) or vcard (vcard).

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.Text
member.summary: Required when type='text'. Body of the text message (with a maximum length of 3200 characters), UTF-8 and URL encoded value. Ex: "Déjà vu" content would be "D%c3%a9j%c3%a0+vu".

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.StatusReportReq
member.summary: Optional. Set to 1 if you want to receive a delivery report (DLR) for this request. Make sure to configure your "Callback URL" in your "API Settings".

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.ClientRef
member.summary: Optional. Include any reference string for your reference. Useful for your internal reports (40 characters max).

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.NetworkCode
member.summary: Optional. Force the recipient network operator MCCMNC, make sure to supply the correct information otherwise the message won't be delivered.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.Vcad
member.summary: Optional. vcard text body correctly formatted.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.Vcal
member.summary: Optional. vcal text body correctly formatted.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.Ttl
member.summary: Optional. Message life span in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsParameters.MessageClass
member.summary: Optional. Set to 0 for Flash SMS.

member.name: T:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsResult
member.summary: Результат отправки сообщения.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsResult.MessagesCount
member.summary: The number of parts the message was split into.

member.name: P:Bricks.SMS.Nexmo.SmsResult.Messages
member.summary: An array containing objects for each message part.
